posts.post_content:
Offered here is a T3 Turkey Red Overall. The card is presentable with nice color, clarity and registration. It does have rounded corners and a small separation in the border around his glove height. The back top has some paper loos from an album removal, but the sides (although darker) have the paper in tact . No Pinholes, no creases, but does show age wear with flaws mentioned above
$269.00 plus 9.99 shipping with tracking net SOLD
